title: User Management

invite.initialDataDescription: Please enter the email and username for the new user. An invitation will be sent to this email address.
invite.roleDescription: Select the access level for this user. This will determine what actions they can perform in the system.
invite.emailHelp: An invitation will be sent to this email
invite.emailTooltip: The email address of the user you want to invite
invite.usernameHelp: This username will be used for database access
invite.usernameTooltip: Username will be used for database connections and permissions
invite.roleTooltip: The role determines what actions the user can perform in the system
invite.emailWillBeSent: An invitation email will be sent
invite.activationInfo: The user will receive an email with a secure link to activate their account and set their password.

activate.welcome: Welcome! Complete your profile to activate your account.
activate.successMessage: Your account has been successfully activated. You will be redirected to the login page in a few seconds.

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete User
deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.

noUsersFoundFilter: No users found with the applied filters
confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete user "{{username}}"? This action cannot be undone.
serviceUserHelp: Service users are used for integrations and automations
serviceUserDescriptionHelp: Describe the purpose of this service user
serviceUserNameError: Service user name cannot contain special characters (use only letters, numbers, _ and -)
serviceUserNotificationSent: Credentials have been sent via email and Slack to the requester.
leaveEmptyToKeepCurrent: Leave empty to keep current password
passwordWillBeUpdatedInAllDatabases: Password will be updated in all databases where this user has permissions
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {{minLength}} characters
passwordRequiresUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordRequiresLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordRequiresNumbers: Password must contain at least one number
passwordRequiresSpecialChars: Password must contain at least one special character
